Rakesh wrote:

> Hi All,
> 
> I have a question on TestSuite.
> Can we decide at run time, which test cases we want to include in the
> TestSuite.

JUnit does not provide direct support for this, but you certainly can 
build a TestSuite any way you like, including the technique that you 
specified below. I have only one comment:

  * Your TestSuite builder class does not need to extend TestCase or 
implement Test. It only needs to provide the method "public static Test 
suite()"

Other than that, you can look at other TestSuite builder classes for 
suggestions on design: JUnit-addons has DirectorySuiteBuilder and GSBase 
has RecursiveTestSuite. They are slightly different designs for the same 
purpose: to include or exclude test classes found on the file system.

Google both JUnit-addons and GSBase to find out more.

Good luck.
--
